Title: 06 - Shape Rendering
Tip: Design your rendering process with a combination of method calls and a series of optional function calls,

Summary.What: Use methods to ensure a repeatable render process. Deligate the 'drawing' of geometry to a function.
Summary.Why: Different Shape configurations have different rendering requirements.
Summary.How: Integrate NO-OP function pointers into the render methods, then set there values dynamically as needed.

Samples.Tip: Include a 'tick' argument in your render method so each drawing can be unique
Samples.Title: use 'tick' to do unique render
